remarks: An equality involving ratios in a complex vector space.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-May-2019.)
statement:
cvsdiveqd.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
cvsdiveqd.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
cvsdiveqd.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
cvsdiveqd.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
cvsdiveqd.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. CVec ) $.
cvsdiveqd.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. K ) $.
cvsdiveqd.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. K ) $.
cvsdiveqd.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
cvsdiveqd.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
cvsdiveqd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= 0 ) $.
cvsmuleqdivd.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( A .x. X ) = ( B .x. Y ) ) $.
cvsmuleqdivd $p |- ( ph -> X = ( ( B / A ) .x. Y ) ) $.
